name: Edge Case Testing Menu with Extremely Long Name That Should Test Text Wrapping and Truncation Behavior in Various Layout Scenarios

sections.name: Appetizers with Extraordinarily Long Section Names That Will Test Header Wrapping and Layout Edge Cases

items.name: Artisanal Hand-Crafted Organic Free-Range Locally-Sourced Sustainable Farm-to-Table Heirloom Tomato Bruschetta with Extra Virgin Cold-Pressed Olive Oil and Aged Balsamic Reduction
items.description: This is an extremely long description that should test the text clamping and ellipsis functionality of the layout engine. It contains multiple sentences with detailed information about ingredients, preparation methods, and serving suggestions. The description goes on and on to ensure we test the maximum line limits and truncation behavior properly. Additional text to make it even longer and test edge cases in text rendering and layout calculations.

items.name: The Ultimate Supreme Deluxe Premium Gourmet Artisanal Chef's Special Signature Dish with Multiple Exotic Ingredients
items.description: Another extremely long description to test text handling. This dish features ingredients from around the world, prepared using traditional techniques passed down through generations. The complex preparation involves multiple cooking methods and takes several hours to complete. Served with a variety of accompaniments and garnishes that complement the main ingredients perfectly.
